mapper.insert:
select replace(cast(gen_random_uuid() as text), '-', '')
insert into declared_yield_field( declared_yield_field_guid, inventory_field_guid, estimated_yield_per_acre, estimated_yield_per_acre_default_unit, unharvested_acres_ind, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date ) values ( #{declaredYieldFieldGuid}, #{dto.inventoryFieldGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.estimatedYieldPerAcre, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.estimatedYieldPerAcreDefaultUnit, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.unharvestedAcresInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now(), #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, now() )
mapper.update: update declared_yield_field set estimated_yield_per_acre = #{dto.estimatedYieldPerAcre, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, estimated_yield_per_acre_default_unit = #{dto.estimatedYieldPerAcreDefaultUnit, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, unharvested_acres_ind = #{dto.unharvestedAcresInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where declared_yield_field_guid = #{dto.declaredYieldFieldGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}
mapper.delete: delete from declared_yield_field dyf where dyf.inventory_field_guid in (select invf.inventory_field_guid from inventory_field invf where invf.field_id = #{fieldId})

delete from declared_yield_field t where t.inventory_field_guid in (select invf.inventory_field_guid from declared_yield_contract dyc join grower_contract_year gcy on gcy.contract_id = dyc.contract_id and gcy.crop_year = dyc.crop_year join contracted_field_detail cfd on cfd.grower_contract_year_id = gcy.grower_contract_year_id join annual_field_detail afd on afd.annual_field_detail_id = cfd.annual_field_detail_id join inventory_field invf on invf.field_id = afd.field_id and invf.crop_year = afd.crop_year and invf.insurance_plan_id = gcy.insurance_plan_id where dyc.declared_yield_contract_guid = #{declaredYieldContractGuid} )
